tool_description: Identifies electrical fire hazards including wiring conditions, panel capacity, and code violations.

electrical_system_age.description: Age of primary electrical system in years

panel_capacity_amps.description: Main electrical panel capacity in amperes

wiring_type.description: Primary wiring type (copper, aluminum, knob-tube, etc.)

gfci_protection.description: Presence of GFCI protection in wet locations

arc_fault_protection.description: Presence of arc fault circuit interrupters

recent_electrical_inspection.description: Date of most recent electrical inspection

known_violations.description: List of known electrical code violations

error_messages: System age error: Electrical system age must be between 0 and 150 years.
Panel capacity error: Amperage must be a standard value (100, 150, 200, 400, etc.).
Invalid wiring type: Use standard types (copper, aluminum, knob-tube, cloth, BX, Romex).
Inspection date format error: Use ISO 8601 date-time format if providing inspection date.
Violation description error: Provide specific code violation descriptions, not general terms.
usage: Specify electrical_system_age, panel_capacity_amps, wiring_type, gfci_protection, and arc_fault_protection. Include recent_electrical_inspection and known_violations for comprehensive assessment.

immediate_hazards.description: Urgent electrical hazards requiring immediate attention

code_compliance_status.description: Overall electrical code compliance (compliant, minor issues, major violations)
